subtle.name: Subtle
subtle.description: Minimal, understated animations for conservative professional look

moderate.name: Moderate
moderate.description: Balanced animations (default) - good for most portfolios

dramatic.name: Dramatic
dramatic.description: Bold, attention-grabbing animations for creative portfolios

notes.usage: Import this file in animation utilities to access preset configurations
notes.customization: Developers can add custom presets by extending the presets object
notes.accessibility: The 'none' preset should be automatically selected when prefers-reduced-motion is enabled
